weka.clusterers

Class AntGridClusterer.GridSurface

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.clusterers.AntGridClusterer.GridSurface
  • Enclosing class:
    AntGridClusterer

    protected class AntGridClusterer.GridSurface
extends java.lang.Object
    A surface to reflect the positions of the instances on the grid. For this clusterer just the grid surface is required, but not the whole functionality of a grid, to do the position calculations.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int[][] surface
      The surface of the grid as an array, where the AntGridClusterer.InstancePlaceholder objects are placed.
      private int xSize
      Size of the grid surface in the x dimension measured in number of grid cells.
      private int ySize
      Size of the grid surface in the y dimension measured in number of grid cells.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GridSurface(int xSize, int ySize)
      The default constructor of this class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getInstancePlaceholderIndex(AntGridClusterer.Coordinate position)
      Tells the value of a grid surface cell.

      Tells if a value is stored for a specific cell.

      Tells if a given AntGridClusterer.Coordinate is a valid position on this grid surface.

      Removes a stored value from a given grid surface cell.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • surface

        protected int[][] surface
        The surface of the grid as an array, where the AntGridClusterer.InstancePlaceholder objects are placed. The two dimensions of the array represent the two grid dimensions, where the first one is the x dimension.

      • xSize

        private int xSize
        Size of the grid surface in the x dimension measured in number of grid cells.

      • ySize

        private int ySize
        Size of the grid surface in the y dimension measured in number of grid cells.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GridSurface

        public GridSurface(int xSize,
                   int ySize)
        The default constructor of this class.
        Parameters:
        xSize - size of the grid surface in the x dimension.
        ySize - size of the grid surface in the y dimension.

    • Method Detail

      • isPositionOnSurface

        public boolean isPositionOnSurface(AntGridClusterer.Coordinate position)
        Tells if a given AntGridClusterer.Coordinate is a valid position on this grid surface.
        Parameters:
        position - the position to be checked
        Returns:
        true if position is an addressable position, false otherwise.

      • setInstancePlaceholderIndex

        public void setInstancePlaceholderIndex(AntGridClusterer.Coordinate position,
                                        int i)
                                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the value of a cell to the given value. Usually this is the index of an AntGridClusterer.InstancePlaceholder. The value -1 is also accepted, but to delete an index from the grid surface, better use #removeInstancePlaceholderIndex(Coordinate).
        Parameters:
        position - a AntGridClusterer.Coordinate addressing the grid surface cell to be changed
        i - value for the grid surface cell at position.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if position is not a position on the grid surface.

      • getInstancePlaceholderIndex

        public int getInstancePlaceholderIndex(AntGridClusterer.Coordinate position)
                                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Tells the value of a grid surface cell. Usually this is the index of an AntGridClusterer.InstancePlaceholder.
        Parameters:
        position - the position to get the value from
        Returns:
        value of the cell position or -1 if not value is there.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if position is not a position on the grid surface.

      • hasInstancePlaceholderIndex

        public boolean hasInstancePlaceholderIndex(AntGridClusterer.Coordinate position)
        Tells if a value is stored for a specific cell.
        Parameters:
        position - the requested grid surface cell
        Returns:
        true if a value greater or equal 0 is stored at position, false otherwise.

      • removeInstancePlaceholderIndex

        public void removeInstancePlaceholderIndex(AntGridClusterer.Coordinate position)
                                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Removes a stored value from a given grid surface cell.
        Parameters:
        position - the position to delete the value from
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if position is not a position on the grid surface.
